head: Petition for Divorce.
ab: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, County of Clarke.
p: In the District Court of the 2d Judicial District:

TO ROBERT FLETT, Defendant: You are hereby notified, that Ann Flett, has fled a complaint against you in said Court, which will come on to be heard at the first term of Court, which shall commence more than two months after the 13th, day of August 1864, and unless you aprear at said term and answer, the same will be taken as confessed, and the prayer thereof granted. The object and prayer of of said complaint is to obtain a divorce from the bonds of matrimony heretofore existing between you and said Ann Flett.
